We are delighted to unveil the 2023 Influencer Marketing Awards Shortlist; rewarding and recognising brilliant campaigns, delivered creatively and transparently.

Click on the tabs below to reveal the shortlist of potential winners for each category.

CAMPAIGN AWARDS

Best Use of Data

SPONSORSHIP AVAILABLE

The Finalists Are:

  • Captiv8
  • Ogilvy North America and Tyson Aidells
  • Ripping up the Rule Book: Overwolf and BENlabs Challenge Traditional ‘Ambassador’ Programs
  • TATAM x Babbel: Unlocking the Power of Data for Growth

Most Creative Campaign

SPONSORSHIP AVAILABLE

The Finalists Are:

  • #CODSquadUp – Call of Duty TikTok Takeover
  • Heineken Silver x Billion Dollar Boy
  • How Goat built hype for the re-launch of Saints Row in the most creative ways imaginable!
  • lululemon x MagicLinks: The Chargefeel Campaign
  • Ogilvy North America and Dove – Beauty Bar Challenge
  • Ogilvy North America and ERA Woman Corp
  • Play-Doh’s Parenting Is Messy by PrettyGreen for Hasbro
  • THE FIFTH x TSB – A workplace that works for everyone

Most Effective Campaign for ROI

Influencity is an all-in-one influencer marketing tech solution that helps brands and agencies of all sizes and from all over the world manage end-to-end campaigns at scale. They use data to help customers make the best decisions for their influencer marketing strategy. The platform puts +170M influencer profiles at users’ fingertips and allows companies to filter influencers by niche, demographics, follower quality, and much more. Influencity provide accurate, on-demand influencer performance metrics that allow companies to make data-driven decisions when choosing their content creators. Lastly, their campaign and reporting tools provide forecasts and compile data so that performance can be estimated and measured from campaign to campaign, season to season, and year to year.

https://influencity.com/

The Finalists Are:

  • Disrupt x TodayTix London Theatre Week
  • Dove – iCommerce Pilots – Ogilvy UK
  • Goat x ThisThat for Meta
  • impact.com and Ellos
  • LTK X Abercrombie & Fitch Cyber Week Campaign
  • Midol Heat Vibes Campaign In Partnership with gen.video
  • Ogilvy/Pulse Communications
  • #PartyNeverStops for FLANNELS by Whalar, TikTok

Most Effective Collaboration or Partnership

Billion Dollar Boy (BDB) is a leading global influencer agency, using industry-leading tech solutions to deliver integrated, effective creator advertising.

BDB was among the first global creator marketing agencies and has evolved to be one of the world’s fastest-growing agencies, with offices in London, Bristol, Germany, New York, New Orleans.

Since 2014, BDB has partnered with some of the world’s leading brands – including Heineken, King, PepsiCo, Campari Group, Amazon, and L’Oreal – connecting them with more than 13,000 vetted content creators and reaching over 10 billion users globally.

BDB is also an official marketing partner of Meta and TikTok, and was the first influencer marketing agency to be accepted into The Institute of Practitioners in Advertising.

https://www.billiondollarboy.com/

The Finalists Are:

  • Captiv8 & TikTok
  • Coca-Cola x Rødekors Christmas campaign by Wavemaker
  • Here For It for H&M by Whalar, Mother
  • KFC Australia – KFC Degustation – Ogilvy Australia
  • LTK X Oasis
  • metapic x Nordic Nest: How to build up a highly efficient influencer base.
  • Ogilvy/Pulse Communications
  • Redefining Personal Finance with Revolut’s ‘Defy Expectations’ Campaign

Most Effective Integrated Campaign NEW

SPONSORSHIP AVAILABLE

The Finalists Are:

  • Amazon Fashion Gift Guide Helpline by Whalar
  • Buddy Media Group – Match Masters
  • Dove #StopTheNameCalling
  • eBay: Winning Back The Sneaker Community with an Influencer-Led 360 Campaig
  • LTK X Oasis
  • OMD UK & Channel 4 – Making Rise & Fall Unmissable For 16-34s
  • Ostelin Strong. Australia. Because when a woman is strong, there’s nothing she can’t do.
  • We see Africa

Best Large Influencer Marketing Agency

Post For Rent is revolutionizing Influencer Marketing by creating a powerful, data-driven network that integrates all existing services into one global ecosystem. Since the early days of Influencer Marketing, Post For Rent has been committed to creating an AI and data-oriented, automated ‘all-in-one’ solution to meet the industry’s ever-changing needs.

Its software and in-house services have always been tailored to enhance productivity and ROI for campaigns. Since 2020, Post For Rent has been connecting leading digital agencies between mid-size and 150+ size, across regions from the Middle East to California, US, into the PFR franchise network, using its top 10 award-winning software as a backbone.

By 2023, Post For Rent is proud to say it is a globally recognized, powerful 360-degree Influencer Marketing focused group with its own tech assets, a full-service agency department, YouTube MCN, and a Talent Management powerhouse with exclusive franchise network partners in e.g., Turkey, Hungary, Pakistan, and Saudi Arabia.

https://www.postforrent.com/

The Finalists Are:

  • Billion Dollar Boy

  • Kairos Group – Best Large Influencer Marketing Agency
  • Linqia, the calm in the chaos of influencer marketing
  • Ogilvy Influence Global
  • THE FIFTH
  • Whalar – Powering the Creator Economy

  • Ogilvy UK

Content Creator of the Year (Voted) NEW

MCR-Agency was founded in 2020 over two lawyers in Barcelona (Spain). Nowadays, MCR-Agency represents more than 60 channels all over LATAM and Spain, been the top1 result in Google as “Online Content Creators”. With more than 15 professionals in the online marketing, MCR-Agency is scaling the influencers marketing in the big platforms to achieve the best ROI for the brands.

https://www.mcr-agency.com/

The Finalists Are:

  • Brandon B
  • Grace Wells
  • Hand Luggage Only
  • Helen Christie
  • Kelly Louise Killjoy X Wavemaker
  • Rimmel London Content Creators
  • The Anna Edit
  • THE FIFTH TALENT x Donna Bartoli

Game Changer of the Year NEW

SPONSORSHIP AVAILABLE

The Finalists Are:

  • Ansley Williams, Ogilvy
  • Ashley Rudder, Whalar
  • Dylan Grey, ThisThat ltd
  • Gemma Styles, Gleam Futures
  • Kristina Tabacco, CJ
  • Meggan Grubb, Gleam Futures
  • Nina Tame, Gleam Futures
  • Rahul Titus, Ogilvy

Rising Star of the Year

Founded in 2007, Acceleration Partners is the recognised leader in partnership marketing and a six-time Global Performance Marketing Award (GPMA) winner in the “Best Affiliate and Partner Marketing Agency” category. Acceleration Partners manages programmes in 40+ countries for more than 170 brands including Target, Columbia, ButcherBox, and Reebok. Acceleration Partners’ fully remote global staff of 300+ maintains a singular focus on delivering exceptional outcomes; and delivers deep and data-driven expertise in all key partnership marketing tactics, including affiliate, influencer, content, mass media, and B2B partner marketing. In addition, Acceleration Partners has received awards for its performance and exceptional culture, including “Best Agency” and “Best Team in Performance Marketing (“Performance Marketing Awards”), US Changemakers (“PerformanceIN”), “Best Workplaces” (Inc.), “Best Places to Work” (Glassdoor), and “Most Committed to Work-Life Balance” (Digiday).

https://www.accelerationpartners.com/uk-en

The Finalists Are:

  • Amber Moak, Resolution Games
  • Courtnee Haley, THE FIFTH
  • Lara Olson, Ogilvy North America
  • Natalie Van Dijk, impact.com
  • Riley Nunes, Whalar
  • Steph Money, ThisThat Ltd
